div.p: The heirs of An[…] have given for the public wheat locally, for the embole of the first indiction, three artabas of wheat by the Athenian measure, total 3 artabas of wheat. I, (name), by God pagarch, agree. Written through me, Pkylios, tractator.
3 artabas of wheat. Translation: J. Gascou – N. Gonis, APF 68 (2022) 159
